questions.q: Can I use MailBar with Mac OS X 10.8?
questions.a: No. MailBar works only with Mac OS X 10.9 or higher.

questions.q: Why MailBar request access to contacts?
questions.a: MailBar need access to contacts for show you contacts picture in messages list. If you denied it, you always can enable it in OS X preferences.

questions.q: Why MailBar request access to calendar?
questions.a: MailBar need access to calendar for show calendar event attached to message in signle message view. If you denied it, you always can enable it in OS X preferences.

questions.q: How many times I can activate my licence?
questions.a: You can activate your licence 3 times and use MailBar on different devices.

questions.q: Do I can use MailBar standalone without Mail.app?
questions.a: No. MailBar working only with Mail.app.

questions.q: I update OS X to new version and get the message: </br> "MailBarPlugin.mailbundle not compatible with new version of Mail.app". </br> What I should do?
questions.a: Just restart MailBar.app. If it still not work - contact us.

questions.q: How I can remove MailBar plugin for Mail.app?
questions.a:
Open Utilities -> Terminal.app and run this command:
rm -rf ~/Library/Mail/Bundles/MailBarPlugin.mailbundle
